Lord Perseus was obviously annoyed by this.

"So you will execute her, just=
 like that?  Without even asking what
her business is?  For all you know, s=
he could be escaping his control?
 Are you so afraid of being betrayed that=
 you would shoot defectors?"

He took one step forward.

ogroups.com, "xochitla2006" <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
